job.title: Systems Engineer III

andor the Advanced Field Artillery Tactical Data Systems AFATDSltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtDuties Include But Not Limited Toltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggt Essential Duties and Responsibilities development concepts to software developers program management and customer representatives during meetings ltligtltligt Work with system engineering personnel to assess requirements and to ensure consistency between system architecture and software architecture ltligtltligt Use Jira Confluence GitBitbucket collaboration and source control tools to communicate information ltligtltligt Identify potential roadblocks and develop around them ltligtltligt Plan and estimate development tasks and work to improve performance metrics
